fi.tuni.mental_run

Class GameProject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.Game
      • fi.tuni.mental_run.GameProject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Button, Collaborations, Collectible, Countdown, Credits, GameOver, HighScores, HighScoreServer, HighScoresSelectionMenu, Level1Tutorial, Level2Tutorial, Level3Tutorial, LevelSelectionMenu, Lives, MainMenu, MenuBackground, Player, Run1, Run2, Run3, Settings

    public class GameProject
extends com.badlogic.gdx.Game
    This is the main class of the game Mental Run.

    The generating of fonts used in the project is implemented here. GameProject's object is forwarded to class MainMenu and later to other classes. Every class in this project extend GameProject.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Joni MÃ¤kinen

      • generateFont

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont generateFont()
        Creates the most widely used black font.
        Returns:
        returns generator.generateFont(parameter), which is the black, size 18 font

      • generateSmallerFont

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont generateSmallerFont()
        Creates the smaller black font.
        Returns:
        returns generator.generateFont(parameter), which is the smaller black, size 12 font

      • generateLargerFont

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont generateLargerFont()
        Creates the larger black font.
        Returns:
        returns generator.generateFont(parameter), which is the larger black, size 36 font

      • generateYellowFont

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont generateYellowFont()
        Creates the yellow font.

        The font is used to highlight the newly submitted high score on high scores board.

        Returns:
        returns generator.generateFont(parameter), which is yellow, size 18 font

      • getLevelText

        public java.lang.String getLevelText(java.lang.String key)
        All translatable texts are retrieved through this method
        Parameters:
        key - String that corresponds with a translation
        Returns:
        returns the string of text that corresponds with the given key
